title: Network Version Function
description:
NETWORK_VERSION provides if IN = FALSE the current version number as

DWORD. If IN is set to TRUE then the release date of the current version as

a DWORD is returned.
name: NETWORK_VERSION

input.name: IN
input.description: If TRUE, the function returns the release date; if FALSE, it returns the current version number.

output.name: Version
output.description: The current version number or release date as a DWORD.

return_value.description: Returns the library version number or the release date as a DWORD.
